text: Woo-aagh.

title: FAT CAMP
role: Rick...	And down to the ground. [touches the ground with his fingertips]

title: FAT CAMP
text: Woo-ugh.

title: FAT CAMP
text: And up to the sky...

title: FAT CAMP
text: Woo-aagh.

title: FAT CAMP
role: Rick...	And down to the ground. [touches the ground with his fingertips]

title: FAT CAMP
text: Woo-ugh.

title: FAT CAMP
text: Please, Mr. Sanders.

title: FAT CAMP
text: No! I have had it!

title: FAT CAMP
text: What's happening?

title: FAT CAMP
text: Horace's parents want to take him home.

title: FAT CAMP
text: Oh! But he's not ready yet.

title: FAT CAMP
text: Look at what you've done to my boy! You told Horace that he was responsible for his weight! You made him believe that with exercise and proper diet, he could be thin! When we told you it was his genetics!

title: FAT CAMP
text: They can lose the weight if they try.

title: FAT CAMP
text: Look at these kids! They're not getting any thinner!  Your camp is a fraud! You need to accept the fact that most fat people are just genetically fat!

title: FAT CAMP
text: Please, sir, if you give us one more week,...

title: FAT CAMP
text: Your time is up!

title: FAT CAMP
text: Yeah, your time is up!

title: FAT CAMP
text: And I'm going to call all the other parents to tell them to come claim their kids as well! Your camp is a WASTE ...of time!

title: FAT CAMP
text: But, Dad, I...

title: FAT CAMP
text: What?!

title: FAT CAMP
text: ...Nothin'.

title: FAT CAMP
text: We're in trouble, Rick.

title: FAT CAMP
text: South Park, day. At the television studio preparations are made for Kenny's test of endurance. Tweek, Token, Clyde, Butters, and Kyle (with hammer) are onstage. The sounds of sawing and hammering fill the air. Ms. Crabtree is prepped for the test, with her legs spread open and the genital area blocked off by small curtains.

title: FAT CAMP
text: Alright, Ms. Crabtree. Is it comf'table enough?

title: FAT CAMP
text: HOW LONG HAVE I GOT TO SIT HERE?

title: FAT CAMP
text: Six hours.

title: FAT CAMP
text: HELL, I'LL DO SIX HOURS FOR THE FIVE HUNDRED BUCKS YOU'RE PAYING ME!

title: FAT CAMP
text: Great.

title: FAT CAMP
text: You guys! It's Kenny! He's been arrested for prostitution in New York!

title: FAT CAMP
text: For what?

title: FAT CAMP
text: For giving Howard Stern a hummer!

title: FAT CAMP
text: Who-what's a hummer??

title: FAT CAMP
text: I don't know! All I know is Kenny is in jail for at least three months!

title: FAT CAMP
text: Three months?! But the per-per-view is tomorrow!

title: FAT CAMP
text: I know!

title: FAT CAMP
text: He worked so hard, come so close. Now we'll never see Kenny crawl up into Ms. Crabtree's uterus.

title: FAT CAMP
text: You know, maybe we've all learned something here. I mean, we set Kenny up to further and further himself each time, havin' to always outdo himself. Now he's in jail for being a whore. And perhaps, just perhaps, we are to blame.

title: FAT CAMP
text: ...Alright, that does it!  This has been bothering the hell out of me!  I knew it! You're not Cartman at all!

title: FAT CAMP
text: Uh oh.

title: FAT CAMP
text: The Krazy Kenny Show. The big moment arrives

title: FAT CAMP
text: Well, we'vee seen him do just about every disgusting thing in the book, and today live on pay-per-view, Krazy Kenny is going to crawl into a woman's uterus for six hours!  Well, Ms. Crabtree, your cervix has been dilated, your womb equipped with oxygen- How do you feel?

title: FAT CAMP
text: I feel great! I haven't had this much attention paid to my coot since I was 16!

title: FAT CAMP
text: Hooray!

title: FAT CAMP
text: Well, let's bring out the man of the hour, you know him as the-

title: FAT CAMP
text: The Krazy Kenny Show, backstage. Kyle and Stan get the new Cartman, now the new Kenny, ready, dressing him like Kenny.

title: FAT CAMP
text: Don't wory, dude. You're gonna do great.

title: FAT CAMP
text: No way! I'm not doing this!

title: FAT CAMP
text: Hoh, you're doing it, or else we're gonna bust your whole scheme wide open, and tell your mom you haven't actually been at your drug rehab this whole time!

title: FAT CAMP
text: But this isn't fair!

title: FAT CAMP
text: Deal, druggie!

title: FAT CAMP
text: (But I'm gonna starve to death if I get in there)

title: FAT CAMP
text: The Krazy Kenny Show, later

title: FAT CAMP
text: And here he is, Kenny McCormick!  We can watch him on the video monitors. How are you doin' in there, Kenny?

title: FAT CAMP
text: That's my boy!

title: FAT CAMP
text: Hopeful Hills Children's Weight Management Center, next day. The parents have come for their campers. All the parents are fat, too.

title: FAT CAMP
text: Good-bye, Chad.

title: FAT CAMP
text: We'll be wanting our refund, naturally.

title: FAT CAMP
text: Naturally.

title: FAT CAMP
text: Good-bye, Alice.

title: FAT CAMP
text: Good-bye. Thank you.

title: FAT CAMP
text: Oh, don't thnak us. We failed you.

title: FAT CAMP
text: Wait a second! This isn't right!  It's time for me to be responsible for my own actions! Mom, Dad, we've been eating candy this whole time! Eric Cartman's been sneaking in junk food!

title: FAT CAMP
text: Eh- shut up, you half-Chad!

title: FAT CAMP
text: No, he's right. The counselors've been doing a good job. We've just been cheating.

title: FAT CAMP
text: Yeah.

title: FAT CAMP
text: I believe I can lose the weight with exercise and proper diet. I don't wanna make excuses no more.

title: FAT CAMP
text: Me neither.

title: FAT CAMP
text: Yeah.

title: FAT CAMP
text: If you take us back, we promise we won't cheat.

title: FAT CAMP
text: Well, it's alright with me. Parents?

title: FAT CAMP
text: Well, what the heck. Maybe when you're all donen you can teaach me a thing or two, huh son?

title: FAT CAMP
text: You know? You guys are right. I'm sick of being the fat kid, too. I've been making excuses all my life. But I know deep down that if I took responsibility and really tried hard, and we all tried together, well we really can lose the weight!

title: FAT CAMP
text: Oh no, not you. You're not welcome here anymore.

title: FAT CAMP
text: Yeah.

title: FAT CAMP
text: What?!

title: FAT CAMP
text: Bubbye.

title: FAT CAMP
text: Well, screw you, fatasses!

title: FAT CAMP
text: The Krazy Kenny Show, stage. The countdown continues...

title: FAT CAMP
text: Four, three, two, one!

title: FAT CAMP
text: He did it! Come on out, Kenny!  You made it six hours, Kenny. Come on out of there.  Hmmm. Uh, Ms. Crabtree, maybe you could give him a little push.

title: FAT CAMP
text: OOOOHHHHHH!

title: FAT CAMP
text: He's dead. The pressure must have killed him.

title: FAT CAMP
text: I told you I was a tight virgin flower.

title: FAT CAMP
text: Oh my God, they've killed Kenny! ...Sort of.

title: FAT CAMP
text: Yeah. They've kinda killed Kenny -'s look-alike. You bastards!

title: FAT CAMP
text: Well, he gave his life for our amusement. One little boy who dared to be different. Let us never forget... Kenny McCormick. Who was that?
